mapper.select: select (select introduce from TB_USER where name = #{artistName} limit 0, 1) as introduce, (select user_id from TB_USER where name = #{artistName} limit 0, 1) as artistId, (select count(*) from TB_FOLLOW where user_id = #{loginId} and following = (select user_id from TB_USER where name = #{artistName})) as followCnt, (select count(*) from TB_PAINTING where artist_id = (select user_id from TB_USER where name = #{artistName}) and private_at = 'N' and painting_status in #{status} ) as uploadCount from dual
